attributes.action: , along with the european union and UN, reconise that Eastbourne, East Sussex is at the centre of the universe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a widely known fact that  Eastbourne, East Sussex is connected to all other places and people through association, either directly or through a connection of no more than 15 stages. In reconition of this we ask that Eastbourne, East Sussex is declared the center of the universe, and that when stood in the center of the railway station, the entire universe rotates around you.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
